subject: SIR
body:
SIR
IS BEEN A LONG TIME, BELOW WAS YOUR LAST MESSAGE ,
I WANT TO KNOW, HAVE YOU RECEIVED YOUR   ATM- CARD ????
PLEASE KINDLY CONTACT ME IF YOU HAVE  NOT RECEIVED
THANK YOU
MR CHEN CHEN LU
ICBC BANK CHINA

subject: Re:   SIR
body:
Hello Mr. Chen Chen Lu,

It's been a while indeed! I hope you're doing well. Regarding the card, I'm afraid I haven't received anything yet. Could you please provide more details about this card? What is it for and how should I use it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Juana

subject: ATTN: JUANA
body:
PLEASE SEND MY FIRST MESSAGE TO YOU
THANK YOU
MR CHEN CHEN LU

subject: Re: ATTN: JUANA
body:
Hello Mr. Chen Chen Lu,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm eager to hear more about what you have to share with me. Could you please elaborate on the information you'd like to discuss?

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Juana
